com.martinandersson.javaee.utils.DeploymentBuilder

    Package Description
    com.martinandersson.javaee.utils  

    • Uses of DeploymentBuilder in com.martinandersson.javaee.utils

      Methods in com.martinandersson.javaee.utils that return DeploymentBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DeploymentBuilder DeploymentBuilder.add(boolean withPackageFriends, Class<?> first, Class<?>... more)
      Add the specified types to the archive.
      DeploymentBuilder DeploymentBuilder.add(Class<?> first, Class<?>... more)
      Add the specified types to the archive.
      DeploymentBuilder DeploymentBuilder.add(Package first, Package... more)
      Add all types discovered in the specified package to the archive.
      DeploymentBuilder DeploymentBuilder.addEmptyBeansXMLFile()
      Will add an empty beans.xml to the archive.
      DeploymentBuilder DeploymentBuilder.addPackageOf(Class<?> type)
      Add all types discovered in the same package as the specified type.
      DeploymentBuilder DeploymentBuilder.addPersistenceXMLFile(SchemaGenerationStrategy strategy)
      Will add a persistence.xml file and a Java DB driver to the archive.
      DeploymentBuilder DeploymentBuilder.addTestPackage()
      Add all types discovered in the same package as the test class using this builder.
